articles.author: Nancy Armour
articles.title: Notre Dame's Hannah Hidalgo calls 'BS' on order to remove nose ring - USA TODAY
articles.description: Hannah Hidalgo, Notre Dame's All-America point guard, sat more than four minutes in second quarter after officials said she had to remove nose ring.
articles.content:
ALBANY, N.Y. Hannah Hidalgo said it was BS she had to sit out for more than four minutes while her nose piercing was removed and said it disrupted her game.
Notre Dames All-America point guard has w… [+1662 chars]
